price: Ó vós que credes! Entrai na Paz, todos vós, e não sigais os passos de Satã. Por certo, ele vos é inimigo declarado.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱدۡخُلُواْ فِي ٱلسِّلۡمِ كَآفَّةٗ وَلَا تَتَّبِعُواْ خُطُوَٰتِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ud'khulū fī al-sil'mi kāffatan walā tattabiʿū khuṭuwāti al-shayṭāni innahu lakum ʿaduwwun mubīnun
